welcome: Welcome to the CLOCK Work portal

roleSelectionView.supervisorDescription: As a supervisor, you hire and supervise student assistants.
roleSelectionView.studentDescription: As a student, you can manage hire applications and work for the university.

student.title: Student Dashboard
student.completeStudentData: please fill in your personal data and upload the required documents to proceed.

editCard.noPetitionSelected: Select a application from the overview table to view details.

petitionsOverviewTable.title: Overview Table
petitionsOverviewTable.noPetitions: Currently, there are no applications available.

confirmationDialog.petitionDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete this application? This action cannot be undone.

content.personal: Here you can view and edit your personal information.
content.files: Here you can upload the required files. Each document should be a single PDF page.

status.newDocument: {document}: A new document has been uploaded

petition.timeExceCourse: Minimum Contract Term Deviation (10 h/week | 44 h/month)

uploadedFiles.title: Uploaded Files
uploadedFiles.noFiles: No files have been uploaded yet
uploadedFiles.pdfLoadError: Failed to load PDF. You can try downloading it instead.

validationRule.percentageTotal: Total percentage must equal 100%. Current total: {totalPercentage}%
validationRule.endDateAfterStart: End date must be after start date
validationRule.eosNumber: Must be in the format 'FXXXXXX' where 'X' is any digit from 0 to 9

acknowledgeGU.text: The development of this project was supported by {link}.

success.approverRevision: Budget position revision request was sent successfully to supervisor
success.studentRevision: Application revision request was sent successfully to supervisor
success.clerkRevision: Application revision request was sent successfully to student

instruction.approver: You can request a change to the budget position of an application to the applicant. Please write your changes in the message box below. The applicant will receive an email with your requested changes.
instruction.clerk: You can request a change of an application to a student assistant.Please select the subject in the dropdown menu and write your changes in the message box below. The student will receive an email with your requested changes.
instruction.student: You can request a change of an application to the supervisor. Please select a subject in the dropdown menu and then write your changes in the message box below. The supervisor will receive an email with your requested changes.

studentSubjects.exceptionHours: Request a deviation from the working hours

loggingin.NoAccessToken: No access token in authentication response
